message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand your offer of $100, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $110?
I'm still a bit higher than $110, how about we meet at $90?
I'm still a bit away from $90, but I'm willing to move closer. How about we meet at $105?
I'm getting close, but I'm still a bit away from $105. How about we meet at $95?
I'm getting a bit tired of going back and forth, but I'm willing to make one more move. How about we meet at $102?
I'm not sure I want to go any higher than $95, so I'll stick with my previous offer. How about we meet at $95?
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $95, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we meet at $101?

I'm not willing to go any higher than $95, so I'll stick with my previous offer. I think we've been negotiating for a while, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet at this price. How about we meet at $95?
